text: Your New Best Friends is the second album by Ralph Myerz and the Jack Herren Band. There is an untitled hidden track 15 minutes and 20 seconds into track 12. ==Track listing== #"Kill The Habit" #"Natasha 75" #"L.i.p.s.t.i.c.k." #"Dubspace" #"My Private Night" #"Dr Lovemuscle" #"Vendetta" #"Waiting For You" #"She Was Here" #"Escape From The Island" #"Bergen" #"So Me" / untitled Hidden Track @ 15m20s ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Ralph Myerz and the Jack Herren Band albums Category:Emperor Norton Records albums
title: Your New Best Friends
